instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
Hi, 
the customer say before intermittent start, but now no boot, green led and pass to orange without battery, no fan.
i check this voltage
PPDCIN_G3H = 16,30V
PPVIN_G3H_P3V42G3H = 16,48V
PPBUS_G3H_R = 12,57V
SMC_BC_ACOK = 3,387V
SMC_ONOFF_L = 3,415V
SMC_PM_G2_EN =3,414V
PP3V3_S5 = 3,335V
PPVRTC_G3H = 3,3332V
SMC_ADAPTER_EN = 3,39V
PM_DSW_PWRGD= 3,34V
no liquid, the board is clean, what can i do?
thanks

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: Sorry i forgot to tell, some trace of something liquid near U7200 but just between a pin 32 and R7279 i clean it but no more thing

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: Voltage of PM_SLP_S4_L, PP5V_S5, PP3V3_S4, PP3V3_SUS?

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
Fan will never spin on these until warm as you should know by now.

Check traces and resistors around U7200?

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
PM_SLP_S4_L=0V
PP5V_S5=0V
PP3V3_SUS=0V
i find R7613 bad value, i replace it now OK but already no change. i check under microscope all the board i find nothing.

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: Sorry i measure PP5V_S0=0V and PP5V_S5 =5,025V

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: PPVRTC present? Check for power cycling on 5V_S4?

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
PPVRTC_G3 = 3,34V
sorry but i really not understand what do you want when you say check power cycling on 5V_S4 it's PP5V_S4_EN or PP5V_S4_EN_D or other.
Do you have an video who explain this measure?
thanks

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: Duke means power cycling on PP5V_S4

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
i have nothing just 0V, i check with an oscilloscope.
is it normal?

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
32kHz present on PCH_CLK32K_RTCX1? 
Checked 5V_S4 for short?

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message:
32Khz present on PCH_CLK32K_RTCX1
PP5V_S4 is not short

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: Then it could be many many things. Inspect closer for corrosion, could be crap under SMC, but could also be fucked CPU.

threads.title: 820-4924 Macbook pro retina 13 2015
threads.message: what is closer? i check tomorrow under SMC.
